name: Hyperon
body:
hyperon is a blog engine. It aims to be fast, reliable, simple, secured and user friendly. 

hyperon is currently in development. 

## Main features

### Posts
- autosave during post writing
- html meta informations inputs
- save post as draft
- tags

### Authors
- inviting authors by email
- adding, editing authors

### System
- database backup in one click


## Collaborators, libraries

hyperon is using [Nette Framework](http://nette.org), [dibi database layer](http://dibiphp.com/), [FSHL syntax highlighter](http://code.google.com/p/fshl/), [Texy markup](http://texy.info/en/)


If want to use hyperon, have some questions etc. contact me [cz.lang@gmail.com](mailto:cz.lang@gmail.com)
